snippet.title: Cat Ace Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Cat Ace is small top-down arcade shooter. Shoot down infinite waves of enemies and try to beat your previous score.

About the Developer
I am a one person studio and this is my first game. Feedback is incredibly valuable to me, and I will do my best to support my games. Please contact me on the forums, my website, or twitter with any issues, suggestions, or simple greetings.

Gameplay

- Get the highest possible score by shooting down enemies will picking up score multipliers.
- Master multiple weapons dropped by enemies.

Features

- Simple arcade controls for banking, shooting, boosting, and breaking. Keyboard and gamepad support.
- Barrel Roll! (You are invulnerable during a barrel roll! Use this to your advantage and smash through enemies!) 
- Infinite waves of enemies!
